title: Melissa McCarthy, Octavia Spencer, and Pom Klementieff film Netflix superhero flick Thunder Force
text:
Melissa McCarthy and Octavia Spencer faced off against their onscreen villain Pom Klementieff on the Atlanta set of Netflix superhero flick Thunder Force on Thursday.

The cameras rolled as the 49-year-old Oscar nominee - dressed as a janitor - appeared to push a dumpster as the platinum-blonde 33-year-old followed her.

The half-Korean French Canadian then brawled with the 47-year-old Oscar winner who, like Pom, was dressed in a black leather costume.

Action! Melissa McCarthy (L) and Octavia Spencer (M) faced off against their onscreen villain Pom Klementieff (R) on the Atlanta set of Netflix superhero flick Thunder Force on Thursday

Of the talented trio, Klementieff clearly has the most experience playing a superhero considering her recurring role as Mantis in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

Melissa's husband Ben Falcone was at the helm of Thunder Force - his fifth directorial effort - which is centered on 'two ordinary women developing superpowers.'

Filming on the eighties/nineties-set action-comedy produced by McCarthy, Falcone, and La La Land's Marc Platt is expected to run through December in Georgia.

The Illinois-born couple's set sighting came the same day Deadline announced their movie Superintelligence would stream on HBO Max rather than have a December 20 theatrical release.

Hot pursuit: The cameras rolled as the 49-year-old Oscar nominee - dressed as a janitor - appeared to push a dumpster as the platinum-blonde 33-year-old followed her

Who will win? The half-Korean French Canadian (L) then brawled with the 47-year-old Oscar winner (R) who, like Pom, was dressed in a black leather costume

'It was actually Ben's idea, it came from the filmmaker himself,' the Can You Ever Forgive Me actress told the site.

'We had a release date, a full marketing plan, and I had all my press lined up. We were really ready to go. When the announcement came that HBO Max was really happening, Ben had this idea. And we thought, is this better? Different doesn’t mean worse, and how are we watching films ourselves?'

The upcoming comedy about a woman getting snarky backtalk from her TV, phone, and microwave also stars Bobby Cannavale, James Corden, and Jean Smart.

Family affair! Melissa's husband Ben Falcone (M) was at the helm of Thunder Force - his fifth directorial effort - which is centered on 'two ordinary women developing superpowers' (pictured in 2016)

The Groundlings alums impressively celebrated their 14th wedding anniversary on October 8.

The two-time Emmy winner - who boasts 9.7M social media followers - gushed on Instagram: 'These two babies had no idea that 14 years later they'd still be together. Lucky!'

Melissa and Ben are proud parents of 12-year-old daughter Vivian and a nine-year-old daughter Georgette.
